rule.ruleDesc: Notification is triggered when Request status is changed from “Suspended” to other status
rule.condition: status in $L.file.save="Suspended" and not (same(status in $L.file.save, status in $L.file))
rule.conditionDesc: ( status in SavedRecord = "Suspended" AND status in SavedRecord != status in CurrentRecord)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Suspended</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">status</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: [Notification is triggered when Request status is changed from “Suspended” to other status (when ( status in SavedRecord = "Suspended" AND status in SavedRecord != status in CurrentRecord))]

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: RM Unsuspension to Requestor
rule.fullDesc: - Send HTML Email: RM Unsuspension to Requestor

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: RM Unsuspension to Request Coordinator
rule.fullDesc: - Send HTML Email: RM Unsuspension to Request Coordinator (when Always)

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: RM Unsuspension to Assignment Group
rule.condition: same(assigned.to in $L.file, NULL) and not (same(assigned.group in $L.file, NULL))
rule.conditionDesc: ( assigned.to in CurrentRecord = NULL AND assigned.group in CurrentRecord != NULL)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assigned to">assigned.to</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assigned Group">assigned.group</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: - Send HTML Email: RM Unsuspension to Assignment Group (when ( assigned.to in CurrentRecord = NULL AND assigned.group in CurrentRecord != NULL))

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: RM Unsuspension to Assignee
rule.fullDesc: - Send HTML Email: RM Unsuspension to Assignee (when ( assigned.to in CurrentRecord != NULL))
